text: 18:3 Aposel 7:29Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn, Sipora ko Mosesɨn otarir pumuningɨn ko Jetro, me izava otifi. An otarimningɨn ziamning, Gersom ko Elieser. Moses faragha ghaze, “Kɨ kantrin igharazimɨn gumazim, egha kantrin igharazimɨn iti.” Egha a uan otarir ivariam ziam, “Gersom,” a gatɨ.18:3 Hibrun akamɨn, ziar kam, “Gersom,” a mong kamaghɨn ghu, “Kantrin igharazimɨn gumazim.”
